meanings.definition: A continuously growing horizontal underground stem that puts out lateral shoots and adventitious roots at intervals.
meanings.sent1: The rhizomes of the plant spread underground to form new shoots and roots.
meanings.sent2: Ginger is a type of plant that reproduces through rhizomes.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit tried to dig up the rhizomes to find hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: The rhizomes of knowledge spread far and wide, connecting different ideas.
meanings.sent5: The rhizomes of the tree intertwined underground, creating a network of support.

meanings.definition: A plant that spreads by means of rhizomes.
meanings.sent1: The garden is filled with rhizomes that help plants grow and multiply.
meanings.sent2: Bamboo is a common rhizomes plant that quickly covers large areas.
meanings.sent3: The rhizomes in the garden seemed to have a mind of their own, moving plants around.
meanings.sent4: The rhizomes of creativity spread rapidly, inspiring new ideas in everyone.
meanings.sent5: The rhizomes of the flower spread like wildfire, creating a beautiful carpet of blooms.
